column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " How about you use your own legs for a while ? "
#Text=Varrick says : " You know , when I fled Republic City with Zhu Li , she carried me twenty miles in one day .
#Text=" Varrick says : " That 's fine , leave me here , let the worms gobble me up .
#Text=I deserve it .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No way mister !
#Text=You 're not getting off that easily .
#Text=You 're responsible for that weapon Kuvira is trying to make .
#Text=Which , may I remind you , could hurt a lot of people .
#Text=" Varrick says : " No , do n't remind me !
#Text=I know , I 'm a horrible , horrible person !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Okay , look .
#Text=Kuvira fooled us both into doing her dirty work and I 'm not happy about it either .
#Text=But , you know how we 're gon na make it up to the world ?
#Text=By getting back to Republic City and warning everyone what she 's up to !
#Text=So , I want you to take my hand and march with me out of this forest !
#Text=" Varrick says : " You really have a way with words , kid .
#Text=No wonder I made you a mover star .
#Text=All right , I 'll take the driver 's seat for a while , hop on .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , great , my feet could use a break .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Oh , boy , here we go !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Are you kidding me ?!
#Text="
